name: marvel-scale
caption: Marvel Scale

effect.short: Increases [Defense]{mechanic:defense} to 1.5× with a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}.
effect.full:
Whenever this Pokémon has a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}, it has 1.5× its [Defense]{mechanic:defense}.

This bonus does not count as a [stat modifier]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.

flavorText:
The Pokémon’s marvelous scales boost the Defense
stat if it has a status condition.
